meanings.definition: Uroboroses: a mythical serpent or dragon eating its own tail, symbolizing infinity or cyclicality.
meanings.sent1: In the ancient story, the uroboroses represented the never-ending cycle of life and death.
meanings.sent2: The uroboroses in the painting seemed to be in a constant loop of devouring its own tail.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled at the idea of a uroboroses trying to catch its own tail like a playful puppy.
meanings.sent4: The concept of the uroboroses can be seen as a symbol of the eternal nature of the universe.
meanings.sent5: The uroboroses in the myth was a powerful image of endless renewal and rebirth.
